hotels.title: Nusa Ceningan Private Luxury Clifftop Pool Villas for Families & Groups
hotels.description: Discover your own beachfront paradise with a stay at Purist Beach, a private clifftop luxury villa on Nusa Ceningan, just off the coast of Bali. Perched on an intimate island just minutes from Nusa Lembongan (the two islands are connected by a bridge), the secluded sanctuary is perfectly placed for days in the sun and surf, with Blue Lagoon, Yellow Bridge and Leboah Beach all nearby. Choose a two-bedroom package for up to four, a three-bedroom package for up to six or a four-bedroom package for up to eight guests - this is the ideal family or group escape. With the option to take advantage of two, three or all four bedrooms of the palatial villa, you can tailor your dream escape exactly to your needs. Whatever you choose, spend your mornings by the outdoor infinity pool or wander down to the sand to enjoy the privacy of your own slice of beachfront. Soak up iconic Indonesian sunsets with a cocktail in hand or cook up a feast in the open kitchen. Keen surfers will find their own version of paradise, with easy access to beautiful breaks around the island.
